QueryDefinition.Query:
with neoplasm as ( select ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, neoplasm_characteristic as source_value, neoplasm_histology_key from {sc}.onc_characteristic l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where lower(neoplasm_char_temporal_status) = 'current' and lower(neoplasm_characteristic) not in ('in situ', 'malignant', 'benign') and neoplasm_characteristic != '' ), histology as ( select ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, histology_characteristic as source_value, neoplasm_histology_key from {sc}.onc_characteristic l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where lower(histology_char_temporal_status) = 'current' and lower(histology_characteristic) not in ('in situ', 'malignant', 'benign') and histology_characteristic != '' ), exclude as ( select ch.person_id as PersonId, l2.note_date, l2.histology_characteristic as source_value, l2.neoplasm_histology_key from {sc}.onc_characteristic l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.onc_characteristic l2 ON l.ptid = l2.ptid and l.note_date = l2.note_date where lower(l.histology_char_temporal_status) = 'current' and lower(l2.histology_char_temporal_status) = 'current' and lower(l.histology_characteristic) in ('in situ') and lower(l2.histology_characteristic) in ('invasive') ), final as ( select distinct * from neoplasm union select distinct h.* from histology h left join exclude e on h.PersonId = e.PersonId and h.note_date = e.note_date and h.source_value = e.source_value and h.neoplasm_histology_key = e.neoplasm_histology_key where e.PersonId is null )
select distinct *, 1147127 as meas_event_field_concept_id, case when lower(source_value) = 'metastatic' then 4181412 else 0 end as value_as_concept_id from final order by 1
